ARABIC: قُلْ إِنَّمَآ أَدْعُوا۟ رَبِّى وَلَآ أُشْرِكُ بِهِۦٓ أَحَدًا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Say: 'I call only upon my Lord and do not associate anyone else with Him.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Say: "I call on my Lord alone and I do not associate any one with Him."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Say, (O Prophet): “I call on my Lord alone, and I do not associate aught with Him in His Divinity.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: (Muhammad), say, "I worship only my Lord and do not consider anyone equal to Him".
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Say (O dear Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him), “I worship only Allah, and I do not ascribe any partner to Him.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Say: "I invoke only my Lord, and I associate none as partners along with Him."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Say: I only call upon my Lord, and I do not associate any one with Him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Say: 'I call only upon my Lord, and I do not associate with Him anyone.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Say (unto them, O Muhammad): I pray unto Allah only, and ascribe unto Him no partner.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Say, "I call only upon my Lord and do not associate anyone else with Him."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Say thou: I simply call upon Allah, and I associate not with Him any-one.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Say, ‘I pray only to my Lord, and I do not ascribe any partner to Him.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Say: "I do no more than invoke my Lord, and I join not with Him any (false god)."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Say (O Muhammad SAW): "I invoke only my Lord (Allah Alone), and I associate none as partners along with Him."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Say: 'I supplicate only to my Lord and I do not associate any with Him'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Say, “I pray only to my Lord, and I never associate anyone with Him.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Say, [O Muhammad], "I only invoke my Lord and do not associate with Him anyone."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [72:20] He said, in response to the disbelievers saying, ‘Abandon this affair of yours!’ (a variant reading [for qāla, ‘he said’], has qul, ‘Say:’) ‘I invoke only my Lord, as God, and I do not associate anyone with Him’.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Say (unto them, Muhammad): I pray unto Allah only) I worship Allah only and call people to worship none but Him, (and ascribe unto Him no partner.
